document.full_text: no man or woman in the 43-year-old open era has dominated a tournament to quite the degree that rafael nadal has dominated the atp event in monte carlo.
document.title: nadal's reign in monte carlo continues
lines_and_colors: no man or woman in the 43-year-old open era has dominated a tournament to quite the degree that rafael nadal has dominated the atp event in monte carlo.
